text:
Hello everyone,
if we have to list a theme on marketplace do we have to create theme from scratch or via boilerplate?

This is a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/theme-requirements|link to the theme requirements for the marketplace>, there is no issue using the boilerplate for your theme, it's what it is there for, the only time you can't use it is if you are completing the CMS for Developers Certification for the practicum
